original_title: Monica Wangu Wamwere: The Unbroken Spirit
overview: Monica Wangu Wamwere: The Unbroken Spirit explores the search for justice by a mother for her three sons and forty nine other detainees locked up during the clamour for multiparty democracy in Kenya. It is a story of courage, determination and power for the powerless. Above all, it is the story of a motherâ€™s unconditional love.
title: Monica Wangu Wamwere: The Unbroken Spirit
